slides.title: What was the Renaissance?
slides.subTitle: More than Humanism: A New Definition?

text.text: Large states with growing bureaucracies
Intense state competition driving intellectual, architectural, and artistic innovation
Dramatic cross-cultural interactions around the globe.
All driven by either humanism itself or inspired by the humanist movement.
